name: Scythe 1
Lore: 'TIE fighter garrisoned aboard second Death Star. Part of Scythe Squadron, a TIE group with upgraded SFS Pw702 maneuvering jets to increase performance in tight quarters.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot. Once during each of your move phases, may fire one starship weapon aboard (''hit'' targets are lost) and/or make an additional move. Immune to attrition < 4 when Mianda piloting.',
